title: reds can i haz 27 rp
body:
i want that lb skin and like yeah i sent a support ticket, just in case you don't see this

i made a poem thing

I rush DeathFire Grasp,
I kill their adc so fast,
Their support gasps,
Just as I end their lives within my grasp.

Then comes the DeathCap,
To find their adc's body, they'll definitely need a map.
Their top laner disappeared with a "Zap!"
Use my w to close the gap.

Got an hourglass,
Just ended kass,
Stopped singed's gas,
Just kicked blitz's... brass... xD

Got the Mejai's,
Is that their mid? Bye!
Hit so hard, you'll get a black eye,
Must hate the colors black and white, cuz all you do is die.

Acquired void staff,
Spamming laugh,
My damage is off the graph,
Rip you in half.

Iceborn Gauntlet in the inventory,
Cuz I lost a bet,
I'm still a threat,
Getting as fed as I can get.

Boots? Pfft, boots are for noobs.
Join the real assassin club.

ty for ur time
